hymn.title: To the work! to the work! we are servants of God

layout.singingstanza: To the work! to the work! we are ser -- vants of God, Let us fol -- low the path that our Mas -- ter has trod; With the might of His pow -- er our strength to re -- new, Let us do by His grace what He calls us to do. Work for Him by His grace; Work thru Him for His praise; Work with Him all the days; And work in Him in man -- y ways.

lyrics.stanza: To the work! to the work! we are servants of God, Let us follow the path that our Master has trod; With the might of His power our strength to renew, Let us do by His grace what He calls us to do.

To the work! to the work! in the strength of the Lord, By the pow'r of His Name, with the light of His Word, All the slaves of the darkness of Satan set free And His riches of grace in His glory we'll see.
